titleStmt.title: Truth cleared from reproaches and scandals, laid upon it by those, who goes by the name of judges, and who went the northern circuit. Also some examinations of those whom the world calls Quakers.
titleStmt.author: Hunter, Cuthbert.

titleStmt.title: Truth cleared from reproaches and scandals, laid upon it by those, who goes by the name of judges, and who went the northern circuit. Also some examinations of those whom the world calls Quakers.
titleStmt.author: Hunter, Cuthbert.

publicationStmt.date: Printed in the Year of our Lord, 1654.

notesStmt.note: "These may certifie all Friends, concerning the accusation of the Judges of me Cuthbert Hunter of adultery and fornication, in the Towne of the Court of Newcastle" (p. 1).
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
